content: Project Scope Statements (PSS) - At least Imaging has found that they need to create a new PSS for their FHIR work. I recall there was a boilerplate 'template' PSS. @Lloyd McKenzie ?
It's 3-4 years old so won't be using the current template and is probably out of date in other ways. Don't they have an old PSS they can update?
If not, check with @Anne Wizauer
One can just revise the PSS and breath new life?
